Articles.Content:
I was showing a buddy the very basics via the tutorial and found that the parachute does essentially nothing. I even changed it via tweaks to open much higher and it never slows down the ship. No mods. Tried other ships in sandbox. This is strange.

Edited November 10, 2018 by Frostiken
Got any screenshots to go with it?
I can confirm that parachutes work just fine. Without more information we have to assume you are doing something wrong, be it have a mod installed or are not using the parachutes correctly.
